channel.title: davewiner tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from davewiner.

item.description:
It's a "shockwave" only if you pay attention to what NPR thinks. I wish they would just stick to reporting facts.

https://t.co/Rl0xC14d8H
item.source:markdown:
It's a "shockwave" only if you pay attention to what NPR thinks. I wish they would just stick to reporting facts.
https://t.co/Rl0xC14d8H

item.description: The news people report decidedly that American is totally fucked, and we think they have some way of measuring fucked-ness, but yesterday the people of Kansas proved that we're not quite as fucked as they say.
item.source:markdown: The news people report decidedly that American is totally fucked, and we think they have some way of measuring fucked-ness, but yesterday the people of Kansas proved that we're not quite as fucked as they say.

item.description:
@Frannydink @Prado_Reports @SupriyaYelimeli @dailycal I didn't know this was going on. Surprising to see an army-like invasion of Berkeley, esp given its history.

https://t.co/29IXiCAB5H

item.description: @keitholberman makes a good point. "Good government" is too subtle a pitch. The Repubs shit all over us. We have to stand up for Uncle Sam. If the president won't do it, get a new president. That's how people think --> Dems. It is what it is. They have to fight.
item.source:markdown: @keitholberman makes a good point. "Good government" is too subtle a pitch. The Repubs shit all over us. We have to stand up for Uncle Sam. If the president won't do it, get a new president. That's how people think --> Dems. It is what it is. They have to fight.

item.description:
I listened to Keith Olbermann's podcast today.

Wow. It's a reboot of his old MSNBC show. I missed this so much.

MSNBC is so much lamer without him.

I rate it must-listen.

https://t.co/u4HgE1zRZe
item.source:markdown:
I listened to Keith Olbermann's podcast today.
Wow. It's a reboot of his old MSNBC show. I missed this so much.
MSNBC is so much lamer without him.
I rate it must-listen.
https://t.co/u4HgE1zRZe

item.description:
Feature request for @amazonmusic.

I live in an area with no cell service.

It takes about ten minutes to drive to where there is service.

I'd like to have my queue not run out for ten minutes.

Could it learn?

PS: My phone has lots of memory.
item.source:markdown:
Feature request for @amazonmusic.
I live in an area with no cell service.
It takes about ten minutes to drive to where there is service.
I'd like to have my queue not run out for ten minutes.
Could it learn?
PS: My phone has lots of memory.

item.description:
@gwthompson @KeithOlbermann Have you tried pasting that URL into your RSS reader app? I have -- it can't find it. Look at the URL -- it's a monstrosity.

https://t.co/WFDdB1Wi2n

It doesn't look like that's meant to last.

@gwthompson @KeithOlbermann On the other hand -- it does seem to work! Oy. I could've sworn I tried that.

I can't find the RSS feed for Countdown with @KeithOlbermann. All the usual methods of finding it aren't working. I want to use my own podcatcher.

https://t.co/YZ6rCkRn8t

Any help much appreciated.
item.source:markdown:
I can't find the RSS feed for Countdown with @KeithOlbermann. All the usual methods of finding it aren't working. I want to use my own podcatcher.
https://t.co/YZ6rCkRn8t
Any help much appreciated.
